data.message: I'm sorry eminem but what exactly have YOU done to help AMERICA? Not a damn thing. Get your nose out of shit that doesn't apply to you. You're an entertainer and you have no more rights than I do unless you buy them. Sell out racist against whites... But oh no let me not offend you or anyone else i forgot it's 2017 everybody gets booty hurt over virtually everything. You're too old to be sticking your nose where it doesn't belong. You only exist because of your fans dipshit. Stick to your day job mister rap artist and stay out of politics.

replies.message: What have you done though to help America???
Obviously nothing just like Eminem. I don't have millions of dollars like him though and a social platform to spread ignorance and hate. Your point?
